title: Sgpa
content: Is 7.5 a avg grade or is it  bad

comments.body:
in this college it's not good and very far from ideal

i'd say, if you're serious about getting placed, a minimum would be 8 and 8.5 would be a solid gpa.

there's 6 semesters, you should try bringing it up

Depends on branch 
Cse /AimL means you cooked 
Ece/eee 7.5 is above average,considering how tuff it gets

Ideally you'd want to aim for even higher given that companies have started shortlisting 9+ for interviews lately. The theoretical minimum atleast would be 9+. An 8.5 is good enough for most companies (atleast 95%)
Well, with a disappointed voice I got very less sgpa 7.3 can I still have an cgpa of 9>=0 till the end of 6th sem?
Use the CGPA calculator on the FAQs to track your trajectory. Use the table on sheet 2.

\>Ideally you'd want to aim for even higher given that companies have started shortlisting 9+ for interviews lately.  
is it for most companies or 8.5+ works ?
8.5 is enough for most companies. Although the top ones tend to be more strict with GPA
